>Construction of pLYC4
acquire oligo olyc3				
acquire oligo olyc2
acquire oligo olyc2r
acquire oligo olyc3r
acquire plasmid pJBAG
acquire plasmid pAC-LYC
PCR olyc3,olyc2r on pAC-LYC	(1200 bp, pcrA4)
PCR olyc2,olyc3r on pJBAG	(1172 bp, pcrB4)
Assemble pcrA4,pcrB4	(Gibson, pLYC4)
Transform pLYC4	(Mach1, Amp)
